Definition: You will be shown text describing {Relationship Summary} along with a protein. Your job is to determine if the shown protein is {Biological Summary} that the text describes. {Task-Specific Relationship}. You may only output Yes or No. If the protein shown is the one described, you should respond Yes. Otherwise, you should respond No.
Relationship Summary: a pathway or biological function where proteins are involved
Task-Specific Relationship: Involvement is determined by whether or not there is evidence from an experiment directly supporting the annotation of the protein

Positive Examples.input: protein: [PROT] description: [EXT] Does the description match the protein? Options: yes, no. [ANSWER] {answer}

Negative Examples.input: protein: [PROT] description: [EXT] Does the description match the protein? Options: yes, no. [ANSWER] {answer}

Instances.input: protein: [PROT] description: [EXT] Does the description match the protein? Options: yes, no. [ANSWER] {answer}
